                      throws java.sql.SQLException,
                             FailedAccountException
        This creates a new account
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the new account
        email - The email address of the new account
        password - The un-encrypted password
        Returns:
        The newly created account object
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        FailedAccountException

        Returns:

                           Account account,
                           Account.FilePermissionLevel filePermission,
                           Account.ChatPermissionLevel chatPermission)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        This attaches a user to a session
        Parameters:
        session - The session object
        account - The account object
        filePermission - The file permission of the user
        chatPermission - The chat permission of the user
        Returns:
        True if it was successful or false it i failed
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • createSessionAccount

        boolean createSessionAccount(CNPSession session,
                           Account account,
                           java.lang.String password,
                           Account.FilePermissionLevel filePermission,
                           Account.ChatPermissionLevel chatPermission)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        This attaches a user to a private session
        Parameters:
        session - The private session for the user to join
        account - The account of the user
        password - The password of the session. Un-Encrypted
        filePermission - The file permission of the user
        chatPermission - The chat permission ofthe user
        Returns:
        True if successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
